containers.name: Adobe InDesign Server
containers.description: InDesign Server is a server-side document-processing engine, provided by Adobe. It provides an API by which it can be remotely instructed to open, modify, convert, extract information from, and save InDesign files.

containers.name: Aspera Proxy

relationships.description: Aspera Proxy can function either as a 6 Aspera Overview forward or reverse proxy, so can be configured to allow organizations to push files across firewalls, both incoming (ingest) and outgoing (download)

containers.name: Broker - Connection Broker
